messages.title: Leading the fight against the Conservatives' hard Brexit
messages.content: Chris Noyce and the Liberal Democrats are providing the only opposition to the Conservatives' damaging hard Brexit plans.

messages.title: Winning again across Britain
messages.content: Since the referendum, the Lib Dems have gained seats from Labour, UKIP and the Conservatives by in-elections up and down the country. This has been the most successful year for the Liberal Democrats in by-elections since records began. Here in Harrow West, local councillor Chris Noyce will be fighting for you - on Brexit, schools and our health.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are leading the campaign against the Conservatives' hard Brexit. Only a Lib Dem win in our area can challenge the damaging 'hard' Brexit that will hit jobs.
Local councillor Chris Noyce will be fighting for you on Brexit, schools and health.

issues.brexitEurope: The election on 8th June is your chance to change the country. A disastrous hard Brexit will hit people in the pocket across the country, with the poorest families hit hardest. We need to protect jobs by keeping Britain in the single market and have a real alternative to the Conservatives.
issues.education: local councillor Chris Noyce will be fighting for you on ... schools...
issues.health: local councillor Chris Noyce will be fighting for you on ... our health.

images.caption: Chris Noyce and the Liberal Democrats are providing the only opposition to the Conservatives' damaging hard Brexit plans.

examples: This has been the most successful year for the Liberal Democrats in by-elections since records began.
The Liberal Democrats are winning across the UK.
The Liberal Democrats had +33 gains while Conservatives had -23 losses and UKIP had -6 losses.
Chris Noyce and the Liberal Democrats are providing the only opposition to the Conservatives' damaging hard Brexit plans.
